item.title: Socratic questioning
item.description: Backlinks # Thinking methods tags Thinking methods Mindset Mental models Learning Socratic questioning is one of many Mental models allows us to pursue thoughts in many directions and establish first principles through strict analysis. The method allows us to explore complex ideas and find the truth out of things while opening up issues and problems.
